mapper.select:
SELECT a.GRID_MTYPE_UUID, a.GRID_MTYPE_NAME, a.LEGAL_PROVISION_DESC,a.MAP_STYLE, a.ORG_CODE, a.SORT, a.MODIFY_TIME, a.CREATOR, a.CREATE_TIME, a.IS_ACTIVE, a.VERSION, b.group_name as ORG_NAME FROM tab_yc_grid_model_type a,tab_group b where a.is_active=1 and a.org_code = b.group_code
AND a.ORG_CODE like concat(concat(#{orgCode}),'%')
AND a.VERSION = #{version}
AND a.GRID_MTYPE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{gridMtypeName}),'%')
AND a.LEGAL_PROVISION_DESC like concat(concat('%',#{legalProvisionDesc}),'%')
order by ORG_CODE,SORT desc
mapper.sql: GRID_MTYPE_UUID, GRID_MTYPE_NAME, LEGAL_PROVISION_DESC, ORG_CODE, SORT, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, IS_ACTIVE, VERSION
mapper.insert: insert into tab_yc_grid_model_type (GRID_MTYPE_UUID, GRID_MTYPE_NAME, LEGAL_PROVISION_DESC, ORG_CODE, SORT, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, IS_ACTIVE, VERSION) values (#{gridMtypeUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gridMtypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalProvisionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isActive,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tab_yc_grid_model_type
GRID_MTYPE_UUID,
GRID_MTYPE_NAME,
LEGAL_PROVISION_DESC,
ORG_CODE,
SORT,
MODIFY_TIME,
CREATOR,
CREATE_TIME,
IS_ACTIVE,
VERSION,
#{gridMtypeUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gridMtypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{legalProvisionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isActive,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update tab_yc_grid_model_type
GRID_MTYPE_UUID = #{record.gridMtypeUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRID_MTYPE_NAME = #{record.gridMtypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL_PROVISION_DESC = #{record.legalProvisionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_CODE = #{record.orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT = #{record.sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR = #{record.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_ACTIVE = #{record.isActive,jdbcType=CHAR},
VERSION = #{record.version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update tab_yc_grid_model_type set GRID_MTYPE_UUID = #{record.gridMtypeUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRID_MTYPE_NAME = #{record.gridMtypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGAL_PROVISION_DESC = #{record.legalProvisionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_CODE = #{record.orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT = #{record.sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR = #{record.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_ACTIVE = #{record.isActive,jdbcType=CHAR}, VERSION = #{record.version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tab_yc_grid_model_type
GRID_MTYPE_NAME = #{gridMtypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL_PROVISION_DESC = #{legalProvisionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_ACTIVE = #{isActive,jdbcType=CHAR},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where GRID_MTYPE_UUID = #{gridMtypeUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tab_yc_grid_model_type set GRID_MTYPE_NAME = #{gridMtypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGAL_PROVISION_DESC = #{legalProvisionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_ACTIVE = #{isActive,jdbcType=CHAR}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GRID_MTYPE_UUID = #{gridMtypeUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
